title: Ticket #3621: User log reports duplicate lines for partitionable slots in userlog
description:
Set up a partitionable slot, add a custom local resource, and submit a simple sleep job. Terminate event logs the following -- note the duplicate Cpus,cpus, Disk, disk, and Gpu, gpu lines: 

    Partitionable Resources :    Usage  Request Allocated
       Cpus                 :                 1         1
       Disk (KB)            :       30       30    342946
       Gpu                  :                 2         3
       Memory (MB)          :        3        1         1
       cpus                 :                           1
       disk                 :                      342946
       gpu                  :                           3
       memory               :                           1
...
remarks:
2013-May-21 14:29:21 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW This one line fix is correct.
